document.full_text: police and armed men in civilian clothes opened fire on anti-government demonstrators in the yemeni cities of taiz and hudaida on monday, witnesses said, as a drive to oust president ali abdullah saleh gathered pace.
document.title: yemen toll rises as u.s. seen pressing saleh to go
lines_and_colors: police and armed men in civilian clothes opened fire on anti-government demonstrators in the yemeni cities of taiz and hudaida on monday, witnesses said, as a drive to oust president ali abdullah saleh gathered pace.
